title: Ángel Cabrera (footballer)
text:
Ángel Ruben Cabrera Santana (<a href="Mercedes%2C%20Uruguay">Mercedes, Uruguay</a>, 9 October 1939 – 15 November 2010) was a <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Uruguay%20national%20football%20team">Uruguay</a> in the <a href="1962%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1962 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="C.A.%20Pe%C3%B1arol">C.A. Peñarol</a>.
He died in 2010, aged 71. His remains are buried in Mercedes.
